p.b: Choose the sentence in which frequency is used correctly.

simpleChoice.p: Frequency is responsible for a great deal of fires, so we must hold more drills in school.
In order to raise safety awareness, the schools increased the frequency of fire drills.
Before they put fire drills in place, the teachers made sure they understood frequency.
Every time the school held a class, it was interrupted by a frequency of fire drills.
